name: Driving Pick-Up Truck 3D
description:
Driving Cargo or Transporter Trucks are not that easy. Its hell difficult. Drive it to believe it. Let me know if you had fun.

All new fun and thrilling driving Pickup trucks and heavy duty transporter trucks are ready for some skillful drivers. Lets See how you drive with heavy loads and tough tracks in DRIVING PICKUP TRUCKS 3D SIMULATOR.

Features
- Multiple Heavy Trucks
- Multiple Levels
- Day Night Mode
- Dangerous Tracks
- Lives and Time Barrier
- HD Graphics
- Cool Sound Track
